name: 战术狂想3-枪战足球(Chimera of Tactics 3-Gun and Soccer)
developer: 自由愉悦小黄猫(Free pleasure little yellow cat)
publisher: 自由愉悦小黄猫(Free pleasure little yellow cat)
description: This is a gun and soccer SLG, player need to command team members to grab soccer with gun and shoot at the goal!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 内存: 256 MB RAM 存储空间: 需要 256 MB 可用空间
